articles.title: Where are the bodies? Missing remains mean no peace for grieving families in Ecuador - CNN
articles.description: For four days, Ramos looked through roughly 250 corpses in search of his dad, both inside the morgue and in shipping containers that had been set up outside to handle the overflow.
articles.content:
(CNN)When Flavio Ramos was wheeled into the hospital room, he was gasping for air and slipping in and out of consciousness. So it was his son, Arturo, who first noticed the bodies.

articles.title: Genetic Quirk Could Explain How Pangolins Can Tolerate Coronaviruses - Newsweek
articles.description: Pangolins are missing two genes that alert mammals to invading viruses. Scientists suggests understanding how they tolerate the virus without these genes could pave way for COVID-19 treatments.
